name: Pixel Art'Vester
description:
Pixel Art'Vester is a game where you have to harvest paint of different colors to reproduce a pixel art model.

In a same line, put blocs side-to-side, separated with a "unpainted" bloc to allow the bomb to destroy line and create new colors.

(For exemple, the explosion of the line will create a "Black" bloc and a "Blue" bloc)

Clic on a color in your inventory on the left to select a color, and paint-it on the board !

Tutorial on Youtube :

Soubdtrack by Ozzed : "A well work analogy" from the "8-bits empire" album
